scripts.dev:renderer: cd src/renderer && BROWSER=none ESLINT=none umi dev
scripts.build: npm run build:main && npm run build:renderer
scripts.pack: npm run build && npm run rebuild && build
scripts.pack:dir: npm run build && npm run rebuild && build --dir
scripts.build:win64: node .yunle-electron/electron-builder.js --arch=x64 && npm run build && cross-env version=$npm_package_version build -w --x64 --publish=never --config ./electron-builder.yaml
scripts.build:mac: node .yunle-electron/electron-builder.js && npm run build && cross-env version=$npm_package_version cross-env CSC_NAME='xiao he (U2784YTGC6)' build -m --publish=never --config ./electron-builder.yaml
